en: I  don’t like going out to parties with friends but I like watching TV..
yr: Mo kórìíra láti máa lo sí àpèjẹ pèlú àwọn ọ̀rẹ́ mi ṣùgbọ́n mo fẹ́ràn láti máa wo tẹlifíṣọ̀n

en: That is why you have not grown sick.
yr: Ìdí nìyẹn tí ìwọ kò tíì fi ṣàìsàn.

en: In time, she gave birth to a beautiful baby girl.
yr: Nígbà tó yá, ó bí arẹwà ọmọbìnrin kan.

en: We plant and water, but God makes it grow.
yr: À ń gbìn, a sì ń bomi rin, àmọ́ Ọlọ́run ló ń mú kó dàgbà
Ẹ Mú Ìsọ̀rọ̀ Ẹni Lẹ́yìn Kúrò.

en: He snored loudly and irregularly every night and at times violently jerked himself awake, gasping for breath.
yr: Ó máa ń han-anrun gan-an látìgbàdégbà lóru, ìgbà míì sì rèé, ó lè ta jí wùyà lójú oorun tí yóò sì máa mi hẹlẹhẹlẹ.
Nínú Yàrá Kan Lórí Òkè Pẹ̀tẹ́ẹ̀sì.

en: He has been described as a man “of consummate ambition, prodigious arrogance, and unsurpassed political skill.
yr: Irú èèyàn tí wọ́n sọ pé ó jẹ́ ni ẹni tó “ń lépa ipò ọlá lójú méjèèjì, tó jọra ẹ̀ lójú bí nǹkan míì, tó sì jẹ́ ògbóǹtagí nínú ọ̀ràn ìṣèlú.

en: A group of preteens are playing a game of coed football.
yr: Àwùjọ àwọn èwe kan tí kò tíì pé ọmọ ọdún mẹ́tàlá jọ ń gbá bọ́ọ̀lù aláfọwọ́gbá tó wà fún ọkùnrin àtobìnrin.

en: Most of us can probably do little to develop some innovative new technology.
yr: Ọ̀pọ̀ jù lọ lára wa ni kò lè hùmọ̀ iṣẹ́ ẹ̀rọ àkọ̀tun èyíkéyìí.
